name: Doomed Escape
description:
Meet Crimson - a doomed soul trapped within the endless caverns of hell forever bound to the twisting lunacy and madness dwelling within. Help the demonic Bat escape the hellish plain, collecting the shiny gemstones along the way! The further you get - the more challenging the caves will get. Luckily, you Crimson has a few tricks up his sleeves that You can upgrade to help you in your adventure.

Doomed Escape is still in development and more content is planned for the future updates (if the game will get enough traction). 

Features:

 - Procedurally generated levels

 - 4 abilities to upgrade

 - Tight Controls

 - Challenging, but fair difficulty

 - Retro style graphics

 - Addictive and relaxing gameplay

Controls

[Press] Left Mouse Btn - Flap

[Hold] Left Mouse Btn - Glide

[Press] Right Mouse Btn - Dash
